title: Looking for Open Ladder Team.
body: I am a looking for good solid team mates can play wherever needed prefer able Mid/Adc add me for a chat and maybe a trial Thankyou LegendAzz

replies.body:
Bronze 4 Jungle, Top!
Can play any time
Plz add me! 
We can work things out

See you on the Rift

OMGHOTDOG
lvl 23. i prefer top, though i can mid and adc. i use nasus, grave, twitch, kasadin, vel'kz and garen. ingame name: **arrow02**.
Lvl 22 main adc preferred champs; jinx, corki, Ashe, twitch ingame name is badsalt.
add me ign Fairy Law im putting together a team of plat+ just remind me who you are
SILVER II Supp or ADC available always :)
also looking for a team B1 Main JG Top Mid
